title: In the next few years, will the Earth be destroyed? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Earth will not be destroyed anytime in the next few CENTURIES. However, there is a 50% that the Eart will become uninhabitable in the next 750 years. There is also something called Gamma Ray Bursts or GRB's I would reccomend you watch Kurzgesagts video on it. GRB are the most energetic form of light, which can be up to a million trillion times as bright as our sun. If it was a few light years away, it would destroy 1/3 of our ozone layer in a few seconds. And we wouldn't be able to see it, until it actually hits us, much like a virus.
Nothing seems to be threatening the Earth within the next few years. Considering the history to the Earth, I would expect it to be able to survive a collusion with a Mars size object.
